flowingashirrobes.label: Flowing Ashir Robes
flowingashirrobes.desc: Red robed with golden trim, created with the durable silks of the Ashir worms

ringoflevitation.label: Ring of Levitation
ringoflevitation.desc: Gold ring with a single light blue gemstone. You feel weightless when putting it on.

modifiers.name: effect
modifiers.label: Effect
modifiers.value: The wearer can levitate at will.

ringofmagicaldeflection.label: Ring of Magical Deflection
ringofmagicaldeflection.desc: A simple yet pretty silver ring. You feel an aura of protection when wearing it.

bastardsword.label: Bastard Sword
bastardsword.desc:
An old, plain bastard sword.

Versatile: This weapon can be wielded in one or two hands. When wielded in 2 hands it does 1d10 damage instead of 1d8.

shortbow.label: Short Bow
shortbow.desc: An old, plain short bow. Requires both hands.

longbow.label: Long Bow
longbow.desc: An old, plain long bow. Requires both hands.

compoundbow.label: Compound Bow
compoundbow.desc: An old, plain compound bow. Requires both hands.

magicstaffarcane.label: Magic Staff (Arcane)
magicstaffarcane.desc: An old, mundane staff of wood which glows with a slight aura of arcane energy. Requires both hands. Can be used as a Magic Focus

lockpick.label: Lockpick
lockpick.desc: An old, plain lockpick. Enables the holder to attempt to pick a lock.

bandages.label: Bandages
bandages.desc: A single roll of bandages, can be used to stabilise a character.

greenleafamulet.label: Green Leaf Amulet
greenleafamulet.desc: A delicate silver chain holding a pendant in the shape of a green leaf. Seems to have a subtle green glow when not looking directly at it.

bloodthirstydagger.label: Bloodthirsty Dagger
bloodthirstydagger.desc: A wicked looking curved dagger with veins of dark red paint. Seems to glow when it comes in contact with blood.

modifiers.name: effect
modifiers.label: Effect
modifiers.value: Upon dealing a killing blow, the wielder heals 1d4 health.

modifiers.name: effect
modifiers.label: Effect
modifiers.value: Gains an additional permanent +1 attack/damage modifier for every killing blow the wielder does up to a maximum of +3.

thaglanadh.label: Tha Ghlanadh
thaglanadh.desc:
An ancient dwarvish warhammer known as Tha Glanadh (The Purge). A long metal haft expertly wrapped in fine leathers sewn with ornate patterns, ending in a large squared off hammer with dwarvish script carved into either side that says 'For the greater good, all may be sacrificed'. The hammer was wielded by the fallen paladin Artair De√≤iridh who - according to legend - carried out the killing of an entire diseased town to prevent the spread. The guilt turned him to madness and eventually suicide. This weapon is cursed, still haunted by the twisted spirit of Artair.

Curse: The wielder is plagued by the spirit of Artair, who will occasionally attempt to compel the wielder to attack nearby targets. The wielder must make a Spirit Saving Throw against a DC of 15 to avoid this. The curse can be broken by blessing the weapon.

This weapon is Versatile and can be wielded in one hand or two. When wielded in two it does 1d10 damage instead of 1d8.

bluewand.label: Blue Wand
bluewand.desc: A pretty looking wand with simple carvings, has seen a fair bit of use but still works well. Can be used as a Magic Focus

thaglanadhblessed.label: Tha Ghlanadh (Blessed)
thaglanadhblessed.desc:
The once cursed warhammer glows with a soft shimmer of holy energy, now loyal to the wielder who removed the curse.

Throwable: This weapon can be thrown up to 6m, making a ranged attack, it then immediately returns to the hand of the wielder.

Versatile: This weapon can be wielded in one hand or two; when wielded in two it does 1d10 damage instead of 1d8.

whiskey.label: Whiskey
whiskey.desc: A fairly standard bottle of whiskey.

sackoftrinkets.label: Sack of Trinkets
sackoftrinkets.desc: A collection of ornaments that look relatively valuable.

displacerbeastpelt.label: Displacer Beast Pelt
displacerbeastpelt.desc: The bluey black pelt of a slain Displacer Beast.

cloakofdisplacement.label: Cloak of Displacement
cloakofdisplacement.desc:
While you wear this cloak, it projects an illusion that makes you appear to be standing in a place near your actual location, causing any creature to have Disadvantage on attack rolls against you. If you take damage, the property ceases to function until the start of your next turn.

This property is suppressed while you are incapacitated, restrained, or otherwise unable to move.

purplescarf.label: Purple Scarf
purplescarf.desc: A fine silk purple scarf. Makes you look fabulous.
